body_html: non-determinism is understandable, index_add uses atomicAdd. Writing an index_add kernel that is deterministic involves a two-pass algorithm, first sorting indices and then making sure one thread handles all the duplicate indices (and this needs a temporary buffer as well), which sucks for perf.
